en.INTERNET_DISCONNECTED:
We're sorry, we can't seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.ROOM_DESTROYED:
We're sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.SOCKET_DISCONNECTED: We're sorry, we've lost your connection to the Jackbox Games servers.
en.TIMEOUT:
We're sorry, we can't seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.USER_DISCONNECT: We're sorry, the server has disconnected you. Please try again.
en.LOST_LICENSE: We're sorry, we lost the license for this content!
en.STEAM_ERROR: We're sorry, we couldn't validate your Steam license.
en.TWITCH_PRIME_ERROR: We're sorry, we couldn't validate your Twitch license.
en.LOST_DLC: We're sorry, the license for your DLC could not be found. Returning you to the menu...
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_1: Fibbe dich durch ganz neue Fragetypen und dem brandneuen Spielmodus Fibbage: Genug von dir. Errate komische Fakten über deine Mitspieler!
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_2: Eingeloggt und angeschnallt! Versuche, die Sprüche deiner Freunde aus dem Kontext zu reißen! Nur so überlebt man heutzutage im World Wide Web!
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_3: Ein Dating-Spiel, in dem du lustige Nachrichten versendest und versuchst, deine geheimen Monsterkräfte zu verbergen. Genau wie echtes Dating!
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_4: Das geistesgestörte Debattenturnier! “Welches Gemüse kann Til Schweiger am besten in Filmen ersetzen?” Wettet mit Bedacht, welche Antworten gewinnen!
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_5: Ihr wurdet beauftragt, die Wände im ganzen Dorf zu besprühen. Tretet gegeneinander an und ergänzt eure Kunstwerke, um sie immer wieder zu “verschönern”.
en.SETTINGS_VOLUME_DESCRIPTION: Mach das Spiel LAUT oder LEISE.
en.HELP_LINE_1: Select and start a game using a controller.
en.HELP_LINE_2: Once you've reached the game lobby, get out your phone, tablet, or laptop.
en.HELP_LINE_3: Go to jackbox.gg on your device.
en.HELP_LINE_4: Enter the 4-letter room code shown on the TV screen.
en.HELP_LINE_6:
The first player to join the game lobby (the VIP) can start the game
from their device once everyone is ready.
